Desc.entry: Methodist church sharing good news of Jesus Christ in action and worship.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 9.30am & 10.45am, Tues 12noon-1.30pm (lunch club - see separate entry)), Tues, Wed & Fri 9.30-11.30am (parent and toddler), Wed from 6.15pm (youth club for ages 5-18 years), Mon-Fri 9am-3pm (pre school group, contact Wendy Hocking 0114 274 7725), Monday & Thursday am (Age Active), Thursday pm (art group, contact Wendy Hocking), alternate Thurs at 8pm (Thursday at Eight, social evening and speakers), alternate Thurs at 8pm (Banner group)
